issue.title: [Rust] Simplify inner loop of min/max kernels for non-null case
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10595](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10595). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The inner loop of min/max kernels can be slightly simplified by removing a conditional.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10595?focusedCommentId=17232256) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
